name: Do You Remember ~An RPG from your childhood~
blurb: Do You Remember is a nostalgic retro-styled RPG adventure that brings you back into a whimsical world of childhood dreams.

rewards.reward: A special thank-you letter from us and a thank-you from your inner child. Watch out for the game when it comes out!
Your name mentioned in the in-game credits as a Kickstarter contributor as well as our thank-you letter. Watch out for the game when it comes out!
A digital DRM-free copy of the game when it releases. All reward tiers above this one will also get you included in our game credits.

Exclusive membership in our closed beta VIP access list. You will have early access to the game and be able to give feedback. Of course, you also get a digital DRM-free copy of the game when it releases.

Exclusive membership in our closed beta VIP access list. You will have early access to the game and be able to give feedback. Of course, you also get a digital DRM-free copy of the game when it comes out and a limited edition T-shirt. Please add $15 for shipping outside the US and Canada.

You will be featured in the school library as a book's author. You can choose the book's title and your name will be the author. Characters in the game will comment on your book. (Names and titles must be within reason). You also get a digital DRM-free copy of the game when it releases.

Your name will be featured as an NPC name in a special part of the game dedicated to Kickstarter. You can choose your dialogue when you are spoken to (within reason). You also get a digital DRM-free copy of the game when it releases.

Same as the $90 tier, except that you can choose to be one of these townsfolk:
- Successful restaurant owner-
- Stylish cafe owner -
- General Store owner -
- Jolly police officer -
- Suspicious thug -
-Rebellious skateboarder-

The Do You Remember collector's edition! Includes a digital DRM-free copy of the game, a limited edition T-shirt and unique hand-made bead art made from perler beads.

More about perler beads here:
http://perler-beads.deviantart.com/
Please add $15 for shipping outside the US and Canada.
We will design an adult NPC to look like you and feature you in the game with a short side-quest involving your character. You also get a digital DRM-free copy of the game when it releases.

Are you ready to be a part of that childhood adventure? Well, there are 5 empty seats in Nadore's classroom. A child in the game will be specially designed to be made in your likeness! Unlike adults, you can be in different places at different times with different dialogue options everyday. A main-questline that involves you will be designed based on your input. (Of course, the quest and character design must fit reasonably into our game's theme). You also get a digital DRM-free copy of the game when it releases.

Ten generous pledgers will be inducted into our Hall of Fame and be eligible to receive ALL future games produced by us (including this one). You will be featured as 1 of the 12 scholars, who will play a pivotal role in the later half of the game. Details are to remain vague due to spoilers, but if you have chosen to pledge this amount, we will contact you with full details. Suffice it to say that as 1 of the 12 scholars, everyone who plays this game will know you. In addition, you will be featured in the credits of all our future games and when we have our game studio up and running, your name will be put in a golden frame on the wall of the main lobby to remind us everyday of the people that believed in us when we were nothing.
